application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of the materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development pursuant to condition 3 of planning application reference: 221777FUL dated 26.04.2023 for the;  Construction of mansard roof extension to provide two flats at third floor level; change of use of first floor ancillary office and staff facilities to create one self-contained flat; first floor rear extension over ground floor retail unit, to provide additional two flats; reconfiguration and internal alterations to existing four residential units; facilitated by single storey rear extension; alterations to existing shopfront; formation of new residential side entrance and adjoining bay projection; first floor rear terrace with associated timber screening and further associated external alterations.
